name: codelive
description: Realtime Collaborate Editor with embedded Compiler

scripts.install-modules: npm install && npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.client: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd client && npm run start
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run crdt-server"
scripts.pre-commit: cd server && npm run pre-commit && cd ../client && npm run pre-commit
scripts.build: cd server && npm run dev && cd ../client && npm run build
